p.1: We created Seated to drive more business to local restaurants by offering our members rewards for dining out, ordering pickup, and getting delivery. By making it easier to discover new restaurants and rewarding members when they dine, we encourage them to explore their communities while supporting the local businesses that help those communities thrive. And we only make money when restaurants make money=E2=80=94guaranteed.
p.3: With restaurant partners and members across the US, we=E2=80=99re rapidly expanding. And backed by Insight, Craft, Rho, Greycroft, and Glade Brook, we=E2=80=99re looking for talented and ambitious people to join us. If that sounds like you, we=E2=80=99d love to hear from you!

text: We are a fast-paced & innovative engineering team passionate about using data to improve the dining experience for our customers. To keep up with the rapid growth in diner demand, we are looking for a
text.2: . The ideal candidate will have proven experience designing, developing and productionalizing machine learning models that address vital business needs. You=E2=80=99ll also play a critical role in building and scaling Seated=E2=80=99s novel data platform, which powers insights about our marketplace and enables us to continuously evolve our offerings to both customers and restaurants.

p.9: We treat our data as a product at Seated, so you will have the opportunity to work across engineering and business teams to ensure we can provide the right solutions to the unique challenges we face. In your role, you will be a key player in a multi-functional team that has a direct and measurable impact on Seated's platforms & consumer applications.

li: Work across Seated teams to tackle data challenges behind key business objectives
li.1: Design machine learning infrastructure and support our analytical endeavors
li.2: Build and deploy ML models that integrate with our batch and event streaming platform
li.3: Improve the scalability, efficiency, and robustness of our analytical DBs
li.4: Develop automated solutions that improve our data quality and governance
li.5: Learn about the complex workflows that improve the dining experience for our users

li: Bachelors in CS, Engineering, Math, Statistics, or technical discipline; Masters preferred
li.1: 2+ years of industry experience, preferably at a consumer facing technology company
li.2: Proficiency in SQL and strong programming skills, specifically with Python
li.3: Solid foundation in data structures and algorithms as well as fundamentals of ML models
li.4: Experience with cloud technologies and serverless architecture, specifically on AWS
li.5: Experience with streaming, batch processing, and workflow orchestration
li.6: Solid foundation with data preparation and feature engineering for machine learning
li.7: Experience deploying machine learning models into a production environment
li.8: Understanding of MLOps best practices and ML engineering infrastructure

li: Comprehensive Healthcare, Dental, and Vision plans for you to choose from
li.4: Pre-Tax Flexible FSA, Dependent Care FSA
li.9: Talkspace Membership with access to thousands of licensed therapists 24/7
li.10: Gympass Membership with access to thousands of gyms and studios
li.12: Seated =E2=80=98Unplugged Day=E2=80=99 - We make sure all employees take at least 1 day off every month to completely =E2=80=9Cunplug=E2=80=9D from work (no slack/no email).
li.13: $100 a month to spend at Seated restaurants (or Seated at Home)
li.14: We have an office in NYC with stocked fridges (for those who wish to come into an office)

p.21: At Seated we welcome passionate people from all backgrounds, helping us make dining experiences more accessible & rewarding. If you have the curiosity & passion to drive our mission together, we would love to hear from you.
